text:
Philippe Leroy, full name Philippe Leroy-Beaulieu (born 15 October 1930) is a French actor. He has appeared in over 150 movies since 1960. He is known for his roles in "The Life of Leonardo da Vinci" and "Sandokan".
His daughter is actress Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu.

annotations.surface_form: The Life of Leonardo da Vinci
